Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities You shall work for Globally Distributed MNC set up, working in the areas of Enterprise SaaSDesired Candidate Profile You have 5 years of server-side web application development experience, in which 2 to 3 years of experience in Node.JS development.You are expert on NodeJS frameworks; Express.js, Koa.js, Hapi, and Total.js.You have proficiency in RESTful APIs and API Communications, and Asynchronous ProgrammingYou have good knowledge of web development technologies and tools like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Git, jQuery UI, AJAX, JSON, MySQL, MongoDB.You have good communication skills, experience in Agile scrum model, Jira and another project management toolsShould be ready to join within 30 daysPerks and Benefits Rs 15-30 la per annum
